product_name: Smith Dolen ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Smith Dolen ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses deliver unmatched clarity and color optimization with a refined, classic shape that's perfect for road trips or urban explorations. ChromaPop lenses use a proprietary technology to optimize color and increase clarity and definition, enabling you to see the outside world with exceptional vibrance. UV-sensitive, self-adjusting Polarchromic lenses respond to ambient light, offering crisp optics and appropriate light levels from dawn until dusk. Polarchromic polycarbonate lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. Black frames feature rose tinted Copper Mirror lenses, ideal for medium-to-bright light. The Smith Dolen ChromaPop Polarchromic Sunglasses have a hydrophilic Megol nosepiece and temple ends that get tacky when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather. 53% bio-based Evolve frames are made with Rilsan(R) Clear, a light, durable, non-petroleum-based material derived from renewable, non-GMO castor plants.
